Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.tracing

Interface LogCheckPointEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, LogForceEvents, LogRotateEvents
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountingLogCheckPointEvent
    public interface LogCheckPointEvent
extends LogForceEvents, LogRotateEvents, AutoCloseable
    Represents the process of appending a check point to the transaction log.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static LogCheckPointEvent NULL  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void appendToLogFile​(LogPosition positionBeforeCheckpoint, LogPosition positionAfterCheckpoint)
      Notify about checkpoint append into the current log file.
      void checkpointCompleted​(long checkpointMillis)
      Notify about completion of checkpoint that took checkpointMillis to complete
      void close()
      Marks the end of the check pointing process.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.tracing.LogForceEvents

        beginLogForce, beginLogForceWait

      • Methods inherited from interface org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.tracing.LogRotateEvents

        beginLogRotate

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final LogCheckPointEvent NULL

    • Method Detail

      • checkpointCompleted

        void checkpointCompleted​(long checkpointMillis)
        Notify about completion of checkpoint that took checkpointMillis to complete
        Parameters:
        checkpointMillis - checkpoint duration

      • close

        void close()
        Marks the end of the check pointing process.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • appendToLogFile

        void appendToLogFile​(LogPosition positionBeforeCheckpoint,
                     LogPosition positionAfterCheckpoint)
        Notify about checkpoint append into the current log file. New data is appended to the end of the log file and located between positionBeforeCheckpoint and positionAfterCheckpoint
        Parameters:
        positionBeforeCheckpoint - start position
        positionAfterCheckpoint - end position
